title: About
text: This is Giovanni Carnazzo’s sports blog. On this page, he is looking into statistical abnormalities and statistical norms which tell help journalists tell stories.

title: Does Bobby Witt Jr. Deserve an MVP in 2024?
text:
Bobby Witt Jr. had a historic season in 2024. He deserves to win an MVP.
